DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the efficacy of diclofenac diethylamine 2.32% gel in the treatment of acute ankle sprain.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Diclofenac Diethylamine 2.32% Gel in Patients With Acute Ankle Sprain
DOC.criteria: Acute sprain of the ankle Injury within past 48 hours. Pain medication taken since the injury Pain or instability in the same ankle due to previous ankle sprain or any other trauma. Ankle sprain due to a known disease affecting the ligaments Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply
